metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9573 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was found in OpenJPEG 2.1.2, in thej2k_to_image tool. Converting a specially crafted JPEG2000 file to anotherformat could cause the application to crash or, potentially, disclose somedata from the heap.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
